name: Clean vents of both display fridges (bar)
description: Clean the fluff from the vents on the front of both bar display fridges at the bottom

name: Clean vents of storage fridge & freezers
description: Clean the fluff and build-up from storage fridge and freezers from both back room and behind bar

name: Clean ice machine
description: Clean inside, outside and behind the ice machine

name: Emergency lighting check
description: Check the emergency lighting is working

name: Disabled pull cord check
description: Check the disabled pull cord still sounds and works

name: Clean air con unit
description: Clean the air con unit - please be careful working at height

name: Deep clean cake display
description: Empty the cake display and deep clean

name: Deep clean savoury display
description: Empty the savoury display and deep clean

name: Sweep under sofas
description: Move all the sofas and larger seats and sweep underneath, removing any rubbish / debris

name: Clean table organisers
description: Get the jars through the dishwasher or hand-wash them, and wipe out the cork holders
